channel.title: Illustrations on Gasimo
channel.description: Recent content in Illustrations on Gasimo

item.title: Flax Engine Icon Pack
item.description: A set of icons I made for the Flax Engine, open to be used by anyone making engines/engine tools.

item.title: Reality Check (GameJam Platformer)
item.description: Short 48hours GameJam platformer made in Unity URP about a silly wizard who can shift between worlds.

item.title: Fragmented Minds (UI)
item.description: I have provided Concept Art (Illustrator, Playable mockups in Unity) for the User Interface of the game. Notably for the PDA, HUD & in-universe devices.
